recommender module¶

Module implementing movie recommendation system.

class recommender.Recommender(database)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class implementing feature-based movie recommendation system.

Parameters:

database (Database) – Database class instance with database connection.

build_matrix(selected_features)[source]¶

Builds feature matrix based on selected properties.

Parameters:

selected_features (list[str]) – List of feature names to include in analysis.

Returns:

Feature matrix as numpy array.

Return type:

numpy.ndarray

prepare_features()[source]¶

Prepares movie features for similarity analysis. Processes textual and numerical movie features into vector format.

recommend(movie_title, selected_features=None, top_n=10)[source]¶

Generates movie recommendations based on similarity to selected movie.

Parameters:

  • movie_title (str) – Title of the movie to find recommendations for.

  • selected_features (list[str] or None) – List of features used for similarity calculation.

  • top_n (int) – Number of recommendations to return.

Returns:

List of tuples (movie title, similarity score).

Return type:

list[tuple]

letterboxd_clone
